mapper.select: SELECT HI.INTEREST_SEQ , MIN_COST , MAX_COST , TRADE_SE , IN_ID , IN_DT , UP_ID , UP_DT , CONCAT('#', GROUP_CONCAT(H.HASHTAG SEPARATOR ' #')) AS HASHTAG FROM TB_INTEREST I JOIN TB_IF_HASHTAG_INTEREST HI ON I.INTEREST_SEQ = HI.INTEREST_SEQ JOIN TB_HASHTAG H ON H.HASHTAG_SEQ = HI.HASHTAG_SEQ WHERE IN_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_HASHTAG (HASHTAG_SEQ, HASHTAG) VALUES (#{HASHTAG_SEQ, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{HASHTAG, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
INSERT INTO TB_IF_HASHTAG_INTEREST (HASHTAG_SEQ, INTEREST_SEQ) VALUES (#{HASHTAG_SEQ, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{INTEREST_SEQ, jdbcType=DECIMAL})
